english: board game; chess; Go; game piece

etymology.interpretation: Wood signals that the word relates to wooden objects such as boards and pieces used in games. 其 supplies the sound value close to qí while adding little semantic content.

examples.chinese: 我们下棋吧(我們下棋吧)。
他喜欢围棋，也会国际象棋(他喜歡圍棋，也會國際象棋)。
examples.pinyin: Tā xǐhuān wéiqí, yě huì guójì xiàngqí.
examples.english: He likes Go and can also play international chess.

examples.chinese: 桌上放着几枚棋子和一个棋盘(桌上放著幾枚棋子和一個棋盤)。
examples.pinyin: Zhuō shàng fàngzhe jǐ méi qízǐ hé yí gè qípán.
examples.english: There are several game pieces and a board on the table.
